column1: # Our all-influenza curation pipeline is located in the seasonal-flu repo,
# which makes it cumbersome to apply curation changes when we notice something's amiss.
# This file contains hotfixes for metadata fields so that we can quickly update data for
# phylogenetic builds where needed. The fixes will be applied to the (merged) metadata
# and if a fix was obsolete (i.e. the strain existed but the fix had been applied upstream)
# then it'll be removed from this TSV file as the fixes are applied.
# The intention is that fixes here are (manually) added to our (seasonal-flu) curation
# The data structure here is a 3-column TSV
